title: Farmer training program boosts yields
summary: Practical training in sustainable farming helped local farmers increase crop yields and incomes.
body: TSD delivered a series of farmer field schools teaching soil health, crop diversification and post-harvest handling. Participating households reported improved yields and greater food security.

body_blocks.text: TSD's extension staff worked with local lead farmers to demonstrate low-cost soil improvements and pest management techniques.
Participants will continue peer-learning circles to spread practices across neighbouring villages.
